com.hp.ov.sdk.rest.client

Interface FcSansDeviceManagerClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FcSansDeviceManagerClientImpl

    public interface FcSansDeviceManagerClient
    A device manager is a hardware system that the SAN Resource Manager can communicate with in order to manage the zones on a SAN. For example, the SAN Resource Manager may communicate with one or more Brocade Network Advisor systems, identified by IP addresses or DNS names, in order to manage the zones on the SANs controlled by those BNA systems.

    • Method Detail

      • createDeviceManager

        TaskResourceV2 createDeviceManager(RestParams params,
                                   String providerUrl,
                                   DeviceManagerResponse deviceManagerResponseDto,
                                   boolean aSync)
        The module aids in creating a device manager under the specified provider.
        Parameters:
        params - The RestParams is a structure containing the connection details.
        providerUrl - The provider URL based on the switch provider obtained from HPE OneView.
        deviceManagerResponseDto - The DeviceManagerResponse object containing the device manager details.
        aSync - Flag input to process request asynchronously or synchronously.
        Returns:
        TaskResourceV2 containing the task status for the process.

      • getAllDeviceManager

        DeviceManagerResponseCollection getAllDeviceManager(RestParams params)
        The module aids in fetching all the device managers registered under the current HPE OneView.
        Parameters:
        params - The RestParams is a structure containing the connection details.
        Returns:
        DeviceManagerResponseCollection containing the device managers details.

      • getDeviceManager

        DeviceManagerResponse getDeviceManager(RestParams params,
                                       String resourceId)
        The module aids in fetching the device manager registered under current HPE OneView.
        Parameters:
        params - The RestParams is a structure containing the connection details.
        resourceId - The resource identifier for device manager as seen in HPE OneView.
        Returns:
        DeviceManagerResponse containing the device manager details.

      • getDeviceManagerByName

        DeviceManagerResponse getDeviceManagerByName(RestParams params,
                                             String name)
        The module aids in fetching the device manager registered under the current HPE OneView.
        Parameters:
        params - The RestParams is a structure containing the connection details.
        name - The name is the device manager name as seen in HPE
        Returns:
        DeviceManagerResponse containing the device manager details.

      • deleteDeviceManager

        TaskResourceV2 deleteDeviceManager(RestParams params,
                                   String resourceId,
                                   boolean aSync)
        The module aids in deleting a device manager for the specified device manager resource identifier. It can process the request asynchronously or synchronously, based on the flag input.
        Parameters:
        params - The RestParams is a structure containing the connection details.
        resourceId - The resource identifier for device manager as seen in HPE OneView.
        aSync - Flag input to process request asynchronously or synchronously.
        Returns:
        TaskResourceV2 containing the task status for the process.

      • updateDeviceManager

        TaskResourceV2 updateDeviceManager(RestParams params,
                                   String resourceId,
                                   DeviceManagerResponse updateDeviceManagerResponseDto,
                                   boolean useJsonRequest,
                                   boolean aSync)
        The module takes in an DeviceManagerResponse object or JsonRequest and updates the existing device manager based on the resource identifier. It can process the request asynchronously or synchronously, based on the flag input.
        Parameters:
        params - The RestParams is a structure containing the connection details.
        resourceId - The resource identifier for device manager as seen in HPE OneView.
        updateDeviceManagerResponseDto - object containing the device manager details.
        useJsonRequest - The JsonRequest body is part of DeviceManagerResponse object which takes in a String containing the device manager details, which is converted to DeviceManagerResponse object using adaptor and processed.
        aSync - Flag input to process request asynchronously or synchronously.
        Returns:
        TaskResourceV2 containing the task status for the process.

      • getId

        String getId(RestParams params,
             String name)
        The module aids in fetching the device manager resource identifier for the device manager name as specified in HPE OneView.
        Parameters:
        params - The RestParams is a structure containing the connection details.
        name - The resourceName is the device manager name as seen in HPE OneView.
        Returns:
        String which is the resource identifier for the device manager name as seen in HPE OneView.
